p: Physicochemical characteristics have been described with an optical rotation Î± (a polarimeter Autopol IV, Rudolph Research Analytical, Hackettstown, NJ, USA), a refractive index n D 20 (an automatic refractometer JI57 Donserv, Rudolph Research Analytical, Hackettstown, NJ, USA), and a density (an automatic densitometer DDM2910, Rudolph Research Analytical, Hackettstown, NJ, USA). Each measurement was repeated three times.
